phrs.translation: 丝虫感染, 血丝虫感染
丝虫性皮肤炎, 丝虫性皮炎
翻译, 致盲丝虫病, 丝虫皮病, 旋盘尾线虫病

sentences.sentence: Other species of filarial worm include Onchocerca volvulus.
sentences.translation: 丝虫的其它种类包括旋盘尾丝虫。

sentences.sentence: No natural filarial infection was found in 5771 Anopheles sinensis.
sentences.translation: 解剖中华按蚊5771只，未发现幼丝虫。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion This was an ideal method to be used in filarial infection surveillance.
sentences.translation: 结论该技术是监测丝虫感染的理想方法。
